rules_text:
Purge [i](To purge, exile two cards that share a type from graveyards. If you do, draw a card.)[/i]
Tether [i](Then if you cast this spell from your hand, you may exile it tethered to a creature you control. When it dies, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)[/i]
notes:
ARTed

Purge (You may exile two cards that share a card type from graveyards. If you do, draw a card.)
Tether (If you cast this spell from your hand, you may exile it as it resolves tethered to a creature you control. When that creature dies, you may cast this card from exile without paying its mana cost.)
